sets.name: Balance of Terror OP Special Build Cards
sets.comment: These faux-cards cover the special rules for the Balance of Terror OP

rulings.name: Free Action and Action Bar
rulings.ruling: This card may perform one of the free actions listed on their card regardless of what the action bar of the ship they are on shows.

rulings.name: Borg Queen: Tactical Cube 138 - Ability
rulings.ruling: The Borg Queen may use her ability (to transfer to a new ship) on a ship whose Captain has been discarded. To clarify, ships are never without a captain. If a captain is disabled or discarded for any reason that ship is considered to have a 0 point 1 skill captain taking the command chair. The Queen may use her text to replace that captain.

rulings.name: Chang: Changs BOP - Ability
rulings.ruling:
Synon’s ability cannot be used on the Free Action Chang performs. 

Yes, Synon’s ability can be used again for a second Action.

rulings.name: Ferengi Captain: Kraton
rulings.ruling: This sets 'Ferengi' Generic Captain is not unique.

rulings.name: Kerla: Changs BOP
rulings.ruling: His ability can only trigger once for each attack he faces

rulings.name: Kuvak: Ni'Var
rulings.ruling: You may use Kuvak's ability when he is not within Range 3 of a 360 Arc.

rulings.name: I.S.S. Defiant: Generic Defiant Cost
rulings.ruling: The Mirror Universe Starship (Defiant Class) in the next posting of the FAQ. It's official cost is 22pts.

rulings.name: Koroks's Bird of Prey: Generic Rear Arc
rulings.ruling: The generic version of this 'B'rel' does not have a rear firing arc.

rulings.name: Soong's Ability
rulings.ruling: If a ship is in your arc but beyond Range 3 you may place an evade token as a free Action since they are not within the limits of your forward arc.

missions.name: A New Source Of Dilithium
missions.description:
Rumors of a new planet harboring dilithium crystals reach the ears of the Federation, as well as the Klingon and Romulan Empires. So rich is the new source that it threatens to provoke open war from the Romulan Empire, and even threatens the Khitomer Accords between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

Each great power sends its closest ship to the planet to discover if the rumors are true, hoping that open war can be averted, but first each side wants to retrieve dilithium samples for analysis. The first ship to reach the planet, secure the samples, and return to its home will be able to lay claim to the discovery.
missions.setUp:
FEDERATION PLAYER
40 Squadron Points, including at least one Federation Ship and one [Crew] Upgrade.

KLINGON PLAYER
40 Squadron Points, including at least one Klingon Ship and one [Crew] Upgrade.

ROMULAN PLAYER
40 Squadron Points, including at least one Romulan Ship and one [Crew] Upgrade.

The ships are set ups as in a standard 3-Player Game (see “3-Player Setup Diagram” on page 7). Place the Planet Token in the exact center of the play area and place the 12 Mission Tokens outside the play area.
missions.specialRules:
Ships moving through, overlapping, or firing through the Planet Token must obey the rules for the “Planet Token” outlined on page 23.

Each ship within Range 1 of the Planet Token gains the following two Actions:
ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and then disable your Captain and one Crew Upgrade of your choice (place Disabled Upgrade Tokens on these cards). These two cards are considered to have beamed down onto the planet as your 'Away Team.' You cannot remove these Disabled Upgrade Tokens without using the Action listed below.

ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields to remove the Disabled Upgrade Tokens from your Captain and Crew Upgrade. These two cards are now considered on board the ship and are no longer the 'Away Team.'

While beamed onto the surface of the planet, an Away Team cannot be targeted by any other cards or effects. While the Captain is part of the Away Team, his ship is considered to have a Skill of 1.

During the End Phase, each ship with an Away Team places 1 Mission Token on top of its Captain Card. Once the Away Team beams back aboard the ship, transfer any Mission Tokens from the Captain Card to his Ship Card.
missions.objectives:
Any player who possesses at least 3 Mission Tokens on his Ship Card (not his Captain Card) may enter warp by moving through his starting area and off the play area. This player immediately wins the game.

Any ship that leaves the play area without having 3 Mission Tokens on its Ship Card fails the Mission and loses the game. Also, any ship that leaves the play area without going through its starting area loses the game.

Alternatively, a player can complete the Mission by eliminating all enemy ships.

missions.name: The Chase
missions.Componets: 1 Planet Token, 2 Objective Tokens, and 12 Mission Tokens
missions.description:
Rumors of a new planet harboring dilithium crystals reach the ears of the Federation, as well as the Klingon and Romulan Empires. So rich is the new source that it threatens to provoke open war from the Romulan Empire, and even threatens the Khitomer Accords between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

Each great power sends its closest ship to the planet to discover if the rumors are true, hoping that open war can be averted, but first each side wants to retrieve dilithium samples for analysis. The first ship to reach the planet, secure the samples, and return to its home will be able to lay claim to the discovery.

ships.name: Dukat's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: If this ship is cloaked. Place a [battlestations],[scan],OR [evade] Token beside this ship OR increase the Captain Skill of the Captain equipped to this ship by 3 this Combat Phase

ships.name: V'Shar
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: Spend a [scan] Token from beside this ship. The next attack this ship makes with its Primary Weapon this game round ignores the defending ship's Shields

ships.name: I.K.S. Klothos
ships.text: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is CLoaked this ship rolls +1 attack die this attack. ----------------------------------- WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is not within the Primary Firing Arc of the defending ship. - Convert 1 [battlestations] into 1 [crit] and all other [battlestations] into [hit].

ships.name: I.K.S. Devisor
ships.text: WHEN ATTACKING: If the defending ship performed a maneuver with a speed of 3 or greater this game round: Add 1 [crit].

ships.name: I.R.W. Talon
ships.text: BEFORE THIS SHIP REVEALS ITS MANEUVER DIAL: If this ship is Cloaked: Perform a white 1 [bank-left], 1 [straight], 1 [bank-right], OR perform a [sensor-echo] Action as a Free Action.

ships.name: Assimilation Target Prime
ships.text:
You do not pay a faction penalty for cards equipped to this ship.
-----------------------------------
All [tech] Upgrades equipped to this ship cost -1 SP.

ships.name: Sphere 634
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: Spend a [scan] Token beside this ship and target an opposing ship within Range 1-2. Discard a [scan], [battlestations], [evade], or [target-lock] Token beside the target ship.

ships.name: Scout 609
ships.text: ACTION: Target a friendly ship within Range 1-2. Repair 1 Shield and 1 Hull on the target ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Voyager
ships.text: FREE ACTION: If this ship performed a Green Maneuver this game round: Perform a [target-lock] Action as a Free Action

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: ACTION: Repair up to 3 Shields on this ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Dauntless
ships.text:
You may equip a [crew] Upgrade as the Captain of this ship. If you do it counts as a Captain instead of a [crew] Upgrade and its Captain Skill is its Printed SP Cost +3.
----------------------------------
You may not equip an Admiral Card to this ship.

ships.name: Harvester Prime
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: Disable any number of Active Shields on this ship and target an opposing ship within Range 1-3. Disable the same number of Active Shields -1 on the target ship.

ships.name: Telev's Battle Cruiser
ships.text: WHEN A FRIENDLY SHIP WITHIN RANGE 1 IS DEFENDING: The friendly ship may roll +1 defense die. If that friendly ship is an (Andorian Battle Cruiser), it may also convert one [blank] result into one [evade] result. If the attacking ship is a Vulcan Ship, that friendly ship may also add one [evade].

ships.name: Guinguin
ships.text: You may equip the Inertial Compensators upgrade to this ship for free and without requiring an upgrade slot. WHEN ATTACKING: If the defending ship is hit: Place an [aux] token beside the defending ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: END PHASE: Flip 1 Specialization card equipped to this ship and target one face up damage card beside this card. Flip the target damage card face down.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A
ships.text: ACTION: If this ship has one or more destroyed shields, flip 1 Specialization card equipped to this ship: Repair one Shield on this ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. Amar
ships.text: WHEN THIS SHIP SUFFERS DAMAGE TO ITS HULL: Once per game, if this ship is Cloaked: This ship may perform an attack with its Primary Weapon

ships.name: I.K.S. Suvwl
ships.text: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is Cloaked and not in the Primary Firing Arc of the defending ship. This ship rolls +1 attack die and the defending ship rolls -1 defence die.

ships.name: Fighter Squadron 1
ships.text: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5 ACTION: Place 3 [time] Tokens on this card. Equio a [squadron] Upgrade that was discarded from this Attack Squadron to this Attack Squadron.

ships.name: Fighter Squadron 3
ships.text: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5 ACTION: Place 2 [time] Tokens on this card. Perform an [sensor-echo] action using a 1 [straight] Maneuver Template as a Free Action, even if this Attack Squadron is not Cloaked.

ships.name: Hirogen Hunting Vessel
ships.text: AFTER THIS SHIP DEALS NO DAMAGE WITH AN ATTACK: Target the defending ship. Place a [battlestations] Token beside this ship and perform a [target-lock] Action as a free Action on the target ship.

ships.name: 4th Wing Patrol Ship
ships.text: AFTER THIS SHIP PERFORMS A [target-lock] ACTION: Target a friendly Jem'Hadar Attack Ship within Range 1. The target ship may perform a [target-lock] Action as a Free Action.

ships.name: Gress'sril
ships.text: MODIFY ATTACK DICE STEP: Disable 1 Shield on this ship. Cancel 1 [hit] or [crit].

ships.name: Lurin's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: If there is an opposing ship in the Primary Firing Arc of this ship and the Primary Firing Arc of another Ferengi ship with a Ferengi Captain equipped to it, target that friendly ship. This ship attack first this game round and the target ship attacks second this game round.

ships.name: Prak's Marauder
ships.text: ACTION: Target a [tech] or [weapon] Upgrade equipped to an opposing ship within Range 1-2. Each player rolls 5 attack dice. If you roll more [battlestations] than the controller of the target Upgrade, steal the target Upgrade even if it exceeds this ships restrictions.

ships.name: Solok's Marauder
ships.text: WHEN THIS SHIP PERFROMES A 3 [turn-left], 3 [bank-left], 3 [straight], 3 [bank-right], OR 3 [turn-right] MANEUVER: This ship may perform a White Maneuver. If it does, it rolls -1 attack die this game round.

ships.name: Goss' Shuttle
ships.text: Other ships within Range 1-2 cannot be removed from the play area unless they are destroyed.

ships.name: Queen Vessel Prime
ships.text: END PHASE: Add 1 Drone Token to the Captain equipped to this ship.

ships.name: Goss' Marauder
ships.text: ACTIVATION PHASE: After this ship executes a Green Maneuver, place 2 [time] Tokens on this card. Remove a Disable Token from 1 Upgrade equipped to this ship or equip a Ferengi Upgrade that was discarded from this ship to this ship.

ships.name: 2nd Division Battleship
ships.text: END PHASE: If this ship performed a Green Maneuver this game round. Repair 1 Hull or Shield.

ships.name: 3rd Division Battle Cruiser
ships.text: Jem'Hadar Attack Ships within Range 1 roll +1 defense dice

ships.name: 2nd Wing Patrol Ship
ships.text: This ship rolls +2 defense dice if there is another Jem'Hadar Attack Ship within Range 1.

ships.name: 6th Wing Patrol Ship
ships.text: This ship rolls +1 attack die if there is another Jem'Hadar Attack Ship within Range 1.

ships.name: P.W.B. Tomal
ships.text: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is Cloaked, place an [aux] Token beside it. Disable up to 2 Shields on the defending ship.

ships.name: I.R.W. Suran
ships.text: COMBAT PHASE: After this ship attacks: This ship may perfrom a Green 2 Bank Maneuver.

ships.name: Jarok's Scout Vessel
ships.text: ACTIVATION PHASE: Place 2 [time] Tokens on this card and target a friendly Romulan ship within Range 1. THe target ship may perform an Action as a Free Action.

ships.name: Mirok's Science Vessel
ships.text: ACTION: Target a friendly ship within Range 1-2. Repair 1 Shield or 1 Hull on the target ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: WHEN DEFENDING: The attacking ship rolls -1 attack die

ships.name: U.S.S. Sutherland
ships.text: WHEN DEFENDING: Cancel 1 [hit]

ships.name: K'mpec's Attack Cruiser
ships.text: ACTION:Target all Cloaked friendly ships within range 1-2. Place an [battlestations] Token next to all target ships

ships.name: I.K.S. Vorn
ships.text: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is Cloaked. If the defending ship is at Range 1, this ship rolls +2 attack dice. If the defending ship is at Range 2 this ship rolls +1 attack die.

ships.name: Prototype 02
ships.text: PLANNING PHASE: Place an [aux] Token beside this ship. Remove 1 [time] Token from each [tech] Upgrade equipped to this ship. This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
ships.text: This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

ships.name: Dreadnought
ships.text:
You cannot equip a Captain or Admiral to this ship.

While this ship has no Damage cards, treat its Captain Skill as 12.

ships.name: Dominion Starship
ships.text: You cannot equip a Captain or Admiral to this ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. Ves Batlh
ships.text: WHEN THIS SHIP SUFFERS DAMAGE FROM AN OBSTACLE OR MINEFIELD: Reduce the damage by one.

ships.name: U.S.S. Grissom
ships.text: WHEN THIS SHIP WOULD BE DESTROYED The attacking ship must discard one [crew] Upgrade. If it can't, place an [aux] Token beside it.

ships.name: Delta Flyer II
ships.text:
You may deploy [weapon] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

You may place an Auxiliary Power Token next to your ship to perform an [battlestations] Action

ships.name: U.S.S. Defiant NCC-1764
ships.text: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

ships.name: Muratas
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shields to re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: During the Roll Attack Dice or Roll Defence Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may switch and [evade], [scan], or [target-lock] Token that is beside your ship for a [battlestations] Token.

ships.name: Calindra
ships.text: When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may discard a blue [target-lock] Token from beside your ship to re-roll all of your defense dice.

ships.name: Sela's Warbird
ships.text: During the Activation Phase, if your ship is Cloaked and performs the [sensor-echo] Action, you may flip your [cloak] Token over to its red side and immediately perform an additional [sensor-echo] Action as a free Action.

ships.name: I.K.S. Toral
ships.text: When defending, during the Roll Defence Dice step, if your ship is not Cloaked, you may roll +2 defence dice. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: I.K.S. Hegh'ta
ships.text: If your ship is within Range 1 of a friendly ship, each time it defends, it rolls +1 defense die. This ability may only be used for 1 friendly ship per round.

ships.name: Orassin
ships.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may spend your [battlestations] Token to convert one of your [hit] results into a [crit] result.

ships.name: I.K.S. Bortas
ships.text: When Defending, During the Modify Defense dice step, you may re-roll one of your defense dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-B
ships.text: During the Combat Phase, you may replace 1 [battlestations], [scan] or blue [target-lock] Token that is beside your ship with an [evade] Token.

ships.name: Kohlars Battle Cruiser
ships.text: During the End Phase, if your [cloak] Token is on its red side, you may flip it back to its green side. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: I.R.W. Rateg
ships.text: When defending, if your ship is Cloaked, you may re-roll up to 2 of your defense dice.

ships.name: U.S.S. Venture
ships.text: If you attack a ship that is in the forward firing arc of another friendly ship, you gain +1 attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Cairo
ships.text: When defending, if there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll +1 defense die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A
ships.text: When attacking during the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship gain +1 attack die +2 if the defending ship is Cloaked.

ships.name: H.M.S. Bounty
ships.text:
If there are only Federation cards assigned to this ship, add the [scan] and [battlestations] icons to the Action Bar. 

This ship cannot be in the same fleet as Kruge's Bird-of-Prey.

ships.name: Cube 384
ships.text: Your shields cannot be affected by Upgrades from an opponent's fleet.

ships.name: Sphere 936
ships.text: If this ship is a support ship, you may equip 1 Upgrade (of your choice) at -2 SP to this ship and you may use a 1 [straight], 2 [straight], or 3 [straight] Maneuver Template to place it in the play area when it becomes Active.

ships.name: Kruge's Bird-of-Prey
ships.text: ACTION: Once this round, if you inflict a critical damage on an enemy ship's Hull, you may search the Damaage Deck for a "Direct Hit" damage card and place it beside the enemy's Ship Card. Shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

ships.name: I.R.W. Algeron
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if your ship is not Cloaked, during the Declare Target step, you may perform a 1 [straight] Maneuver before choosing an enemy ship to attack.

ships.name: U.S.S. Reliant
ships.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable any number of your Active Shields to re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of Shields you disabled.

ships.name: I.K.S. Drovana
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard 1 of your non-disabled Upgrades to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result.

ships.name: U.S.S. Constellation
ships.text: If all of your Shields have been destroyed when attacking with your Primary Weapon, you may gain +2 attack dice. If you do, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot roll any defence dice during a round in which you use this ability.

ships.name: Xindus
ships.text: When firing a Photon Torpedo Upgrade, place 1 less Time Token on that Upgrade.

ships.name: I.R.W. Jazkal
ships.text: While there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, you cannot be targeted by any [talent] Upgrades and you roll +1 defense die against all attacks made with [weapon] Upgrades.

ships.name: I.K.S. Amar
ships.text: When attacking if you do not hit the defending ship, place an [evade] Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Montgolfier
ships.text: If your ship has an opposing ship target locked, during the Activation Phase, you may switch the target lock to a different ship within Range 1-3 as a free Action

ships.name: Weapon Zero
ships.text: When defending, during the Roll Defence Dice step you may roll 1 defence die for each [hit] or [crit] result rolled by the attacking ship. If you do so, Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: Scorpion 4
ships.text:
Attack Squadron Tokens: 5

If you attack during a round in which you performed a ([come-about]) Come About Maneuver, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

ships.name: ROMULAN ATTACK FIGHTERS
ships.text: Attack Squadron Tokens: 4

ships.name: I.R.W. T'MET
ships.text: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, when attacking with your Primary Weapon at Range 1 this round, gain +1 attack die and roll -1 defence die.

ships.name: Dreadnought
ships.text: You cannot assign a Captain or an Admiral to this ship. When defending during the Compare Results step you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades to cancel an equal number of attacking ships dice.

ships.name: Halik Raider
ships.text: When defending during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shields to gain +2 defence dice for that attack.

ships.name: DENORIOS
ships.text: When Defending during the Compare Results step, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to cancel 1 [hit] result.

ships.name: Robinson
ships.text: When defending if you are hit and you don't already have a 'Warp Core Breach' critical damage card assigned to your ship you may chose to ignore up to 3 damage being inflicted to your ship and suffer a 'Warp Core Breach' critical damage instead.

ships.name: U.S.S. Valiant
ships.text: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard the Photon Torpedoes Upgrade to gain 1 additional attack die.

ships.name: KUMARI
ships.text: You may perform an [evade] Action while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Hathaway
ships.text: During the Activation Phase, you may perform a second Action from your Action Bar as a free Action. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: R.I.S. Pi
ships.text: During the Activation Phase you may perform a [scan] Action as a free Action. If you do so place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack with your primary weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 3 attack dice.

ships.name: Federation Starship
I.R.W. Khazara
ships.text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, add +1 attack die.

ships.name: Romulan Starship
I.K.S. Maht-H'A
ships.text: Any ship attacking you at Range 1 rolls 1 less attack die.

ships.name: U.S.S. Reliant
ships.text: You gain +1 attack die when firing at Range 1.

ships.name: Federation Starship
U.S.S. Enterprise
ships.text: The U.S.S. Enterprise can perform an Action listed on its Action Bar while it has an Auxiliary Power Token.

ships.name: Federation Starship
I.R.W. Valdore
ships.text: If you perform a Green Maneuver, add +1 attack die for the remainder of this round.

ships.name: R.I.S. Apnex
ships.text: ACTION (once/game): Every ship at Range 1 sustains 1 damage (including this ship). During the Planning Phase, this ship must choose a '1' Maneuver (forward, bank or turn) for the rest of the game.

ships.name: Romulan Science Vessel
I.K.S. Gr'oth
ships.text: Each time you defend against a ship at Range 1, roll 1 extra defense die.

ships.name: Klingon Battlecruiser
I.K.S. Negh'var
ships.text: ACTION: Target a ship within your firing arc at Range 1-2 and roll 3 attack dice. For each [hit] result disable 1 of that ship's Shields. If possible, you may play Klingon Boarding Party as a free action this turn.

ships.name: Klingon Starship
Kraxon
ships.text: Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage you may transfer any amount of that damage to your own Shields, if possible.

ships.name: Dominion Starship
Gor Portas
ships.text: Although you must be Target Locked on a ship to fire a Torpedo at it, you do not need to discard your Target Lock when doing so.

ships.name: Dominion Starship
Krayton
ships.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die this round. You may re-roll all of your blank results once.

ships.name: Deep Space 9
ships.text: When firing any torpedoes, do not disable the torpedoes.

ships.name: Abandoned Space Station
I.K.S. Ch'tang
ships.text: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

ships.name: Klingon Starship
P.W.B. Aj'Rmr
ships.text: Each time you attack, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice for every damage card assigned to your ship.

ships.name: U.S.S. Defiant
ships.text: When defending, convert all of your opponent's [crit] results into [hit] results.

ships.name: I.K.S. Kronos One
ships.text: Any ship attacking you at Range 3 rolls 1 less attack die.

ships.name: I.R.W. Praetus
ships.text: You may use the [cloak] Action even if you have no Active Shields. Whenever you choose the [cloak] Action, roll 1 attack die. On a [battlestations] result, your Hull sustains 1 Damage.

ships.name: 5th Wing Patrol Ship
ships.text: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. When defending this round, roll one less defense die.

ships.name: I.K.S. Koraga
ships.text: Each time you defend while Cloaked, roll +1 defense die

ships.name: Koranak
ships.text: Instead of making a normal attack, you may spend a [scan] Token to attack 2 different ships with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice each.

ships.name: U.S.S. Excelsior
ships.text: After you move, if no enemy ships are within Range 1 of your ship, you may perform a [scan] action as a free action.

ships.name: R.I.S. Vo
ships.text: After you move, you may perform an [evade] Action as a free Action. If you do so, you cannot attack during this round.

ships.name: U.S.S. Sutherland
ships.text: When you initiate an attack at range 3, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

ships.name: Rav Laerst
ships.text: ACTION: Perform a [sensor-echo] Action even if this ship is not Cloaked. You may only use the 1 [forward] Maneuver Template for this Action.

ships.name: U.S.S. Equinox

captains.name: Magnus Hansen
captains.text:
During the Modify Defense Dice step of the combat phase, you may spend 1 [scan] token to add 1 additional [evade] result to your defense roll. 

You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Magnus Hansen to a Federation ship.

captains.name: J. Hayes
captains.text: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die this round. At the end of the Combat Phase, suffer 1 normal damage to your Hull.

captains.name: Third of Five
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 3 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll +1 defense die. You cannot assign this card to the same ship or fleet as Hugh.

captains.name: Elim Garak
captains.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [crew] Upgrades to roll +1 attack die.

captains.name: Haron
captains.text:
Add 1 [weapon] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. 

All of your Kazon [weapon] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

captains.name: Kerla
captains.text: Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice to add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

captains.name: Worf
captains.text: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship.

captains.name: Slar
captains.text: You may field the "Salvage" [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Gul Ocett
captains.text: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [crit], you may search the Damage Deck for a "Power Disruption" or a "Minor Explosion" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

captains.name: Data
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 1 [evade], 1 [scan], and 1 [battlestations] Token on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may take 1 of these Tokens off this card and place it beside your ship, even if there is already one there.

captains.name: Gardner
captains.text: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.

captains.name: Erik Pressman
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [tech] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR ACTION: Discard 1 of your [tech] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.

captains.name: Lovok
captains.text:
During the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Lovok may field the Tal Shiar [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Arturis
captains.text:
Arturis' Captain Skill is +5 if he is assigned to a Dauntless class ship.

ACTION: Target a ship at Range 2-3. disable either the Captain Card or up to 2 [crew] Upgrades on the target ship (your choice). Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Tarr
captains.text: At the start of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward arc of an enemy ship and you do not have a [battlestations] Token beside your ship, you may place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Quark
captains.text: ACTION: Discard all of your Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-2. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You must discard at least 1 Upgrade to use this Action. You cannot attack or perform any free Actions this round.

captains.name: Telek R'Mor
captains.text:
Each time you defend, if you have at least 1 [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

You may field the Secret Research [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Kaybok
captains.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of [tech] and [weapon] Upgrades deployed to the defending ship.

captains.name: Morag
captains.text: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Vidiian Captain
captains.text: PLANNIG PHASE: Target an opposing ship. Disable 1 [crew] Upgrade equipped to the target ship.

captains.name: Gorn Captain
captains.text: ACTION: Disable this card and target an opposing ship. Disable the Captain equipped to the target ship.

captains.name: Daimon Solok
captains.text: SETUP: Place 2 GPLT on this card and place 2 [crew] Upgrades each with a printed cost of 3 SP or less face down beneath this card. ---------------------------------------- ACTIVATION PHASE: Spend 1 GPLT. Flip a [crew] Upgrade beneath this card face up and equip it to this ship even if it exceeds this ships restrictions. Remove the other face down [crew] Upgrade beneath this card from the game.

captains.name: Lursa
captains.text: At the beginning of the game round, you may flip this card. ---------------------------------------- WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is Cloaked. This ship rolls +1 attack die.

captains.name: B'Etor
captains.text: At the beginning of the game round, you may flip this card. ---------------------------------------- WHEN DEFENDING: If this ship is Cloaked. This ship rolls +2 defense die.

captains.name: Data
captains.text: ACTION: Target a Cloaked opposing ship. Remove the target ship's [cloak] Token and enable its Shields.

captains.name: Kilana
captains.text: WHEN A [tech] UPGRADE EQUIPPED TO THIS SHIP WOULD BE DISABLED: You may place 2 [time] Tokens on it instead.

captains.name: Degra
captains.text: When attacking with a Secondary [weapon] Upgrade, gain +1 attack die. +2 attack dice if the attack is made with a Xindi [weapon] Upgrade.

captains.name: Kiaphet Amman'Sor
captains.text: ACTION: When defending this round roll +1 defense die. In addition if this card is assigned to a Xindi ship when attacking this round gain +1 attack die.

captains.name: B'Etor
captains.text:
A friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship may use the Action or Ability of your [talent] Upgrade as if it were assigned to that ship.

If Lursa is the Captain of your ship, you may fill one of your [crew] Upgrade slots with this card and gain +4 to your Captain Skill.

captains.name: Lursa
captains.text:
You may preform a [cloak] or a [sensor-echo] Action as a free action, if your ship has the appropriate Action on its Action Bar

If B'Etor is the Captain of your ship, you may fill one of your [crew] Upgrade slots with this card and gain +4 to your Captain Skill.

captains.name: Tal
captains.text: If this card is assigned to a Romulan ship, when attacking at Range 1 with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step gain +1 attack die.

captains.name: Donald Varley
captains.text: Your ship may perform a [scan] Action as a free Action each round.

captains.name: Tactial Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Spend 2 of your Drone Tokens to target a ship at Range 1-2. Discard 1 [evade], 1 [scan], or 1 [battlestations] Token from beside that ship. Place a [scan] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Tim Watters
captains.text: Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Remove all Disabled Upgrade Tokens from all of your [crew] Upgrade.

captains.name: Mirok
captains.text: After you move, if at least one friendly ship is within Range 1 of your ship, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

captains.name: Krell
captains.text: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 of your [battlestations] results.

captains.name: Gul Evek
captains.text: Each time you defend, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

captains.name: Data
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [crew] upgrades and 1 of your [weapon] upgrades to target all Cloaked ship at range 1-3 of your ship. Target ships immediately flip their [cloak] tokens to their red sides.

captains.name: Rudolph Ransom
captains.text: When defending, if there is an [evade] token beside your ship, roll +2 defense dice.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text:
At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. 

When attacking, you may spend 1 Drone Token to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

captains.name: Culluh
captains.text: After you move, you may discard 1 of your [crew] Upgrades to perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action this round.

captains.name: Loskene
captains.text: ACTION: Target 1 friendly ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship and whose Captain has a lower Skill than Loskene's. Target ship may immediately perform an additional 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn). The additional Maneuver must be on the target ship's Maneuver Dial.

captains.name: Gorn Commander
captains.text: When attacking, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [hit] result.

captains.name: Hugh
captains.text:
All of your [crew] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any Borg Upgrades to your ship.

captains.name: Keevan
captains.text: ACTION: Target 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2 in your forward firing arc. Your ship cannot attack any other ship this round and must attack that ship, if possible. During the Combat Phase, if your ship attacks with its Primary Weapon, it resolves its attack immediately before the target ship, as if it had a higher Captain Skill than that ship. If the target ship attacks your ship this round, it gains +4 attack dice.

captains.name: Maxwell Forrest
captains.text: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

captains.name: Kuvak
captains.text: After you move, if you perform an [evade] Action, you may place 2 [evade] Tokens beside your ship instead of 1 if your ship is not in the forward firing arc of any enemy ships.

captains.name: Matthew Dougherty
captains.text: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.

captains.name: Benjamin Sisko
captains.text: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades ([crew], [tech] or [weapon]). If you do so, gain +1 attack die to that attack for each Upgrade you discarded with this card.

captains.name: Gorkon
captains.text: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [evade] result, place 1 [evade] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [evade] Action as a free Action this round.

captains.name: Kira Nerys
captains.text: When a [crew] Upgrade on an enemy ship within Range 1-2 of your ship performs an Action that would affect your ship, you may disable this card to prevent that Action from taking effect. If you do this, the enemy ship cannot take another Action that round. If the enemy [crew] Upgrade was disabled to perform the Action, it remains disabled. If the enemy [crew] Upgrade was discarded to perform the Action, disable it instead.

captains.name: Gul Lemec
captains.text: When attacking a ship whose Captain has a lower Skill number than Gul Lemec's, gain +1 attack die against that ship.

captains.name: Soval
captains.text: You do not pay a faction penalty when deploying any Upgrades to your ship.

captains.name: Black
captains.text: ACTION: Perform a [sensor-echo] Action with a 1 [forward] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [sensor-echo] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Obrist
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 1 Mission Token on this card. ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, discard the Mission Token from this card and 1 of your [weapon] Upgrade to target a ship at Range 1-2. You cannot attack or be attacked by that ship this round. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

captains.name: Robert DeSoto
captains.text: Each time you defend, you may re-roll a number of your defense dice equal to the number of [crew] Upgrades assigned to your ship (max 3 dice).

captains.name: Day Kannu
captains.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may set one of your attack dice on the result of your choice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled during the round you use this ability.

captains.name: Kurn
captains.text: You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning Kurn to any ship. Kurn may field the "Mauk-to'Vor" [talent] Upgrade at a cost of 3 SP.

captains.name: Worf
captains.text: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may roll up to 2 additional defense dice. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship for each extra die you rolled.

captains.name: Tom Paris
captains.text:
If this card is assigned to a ship with a Hull value of 2 or less, whenever your ship executes a red maneuver, treat it as a white maneuver instead

If this card is assigned to a shuttlecraft you cannot perform a 'Docking' Action on the round you use this ability.

captains.name: Tom Paris
captains.text: If you reveal a 3[straight] Maneuver, you may perform a 4[straight] Maneuver instead. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If this card is assigned to a shuttlecraft, you cannot perform a Docking Action on the round you use this ability.

captains.name: Bractor
captains.text: When attacking a ship that has an Auxiliary Power Token beside it, gain +1 attack die.

captains.name: Erika Benteen
captains.text: ACTION: Disable this card and all of your [weapon] Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-3. Your ship cannot attack the target ship and that ship cannot attack your ship this round. You must disable at least 1 [weapon] Upgrade to use this Action.

captains.name: Brunt
captains.text: ACTION: When defending this round, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may force 1 opposing ship to re-roll 1 of its attack dice (your choice). You may field the Grand Nagus [talent] Upgrade. If you use the Action listed on it, you must discard this card as well.

captains.name: Tavin
captains.text: At any time, you may replace 1 [evade], [scan] or [battlestations] Token beside your ship for 1 [evade], [scan] or [battlestations] Token. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Tomalak
captains.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results once.

captains.name: Shanthi
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [cloak] Token over to its red side.

captains.name: Hirogen Hunter
captains.text:
Hirogen Hunter counts as a Hirogen Captain.

This ship may use the action on a Tractor Beam Upgrade as a free Action.

captains.name: Vorta Commander
captains.text: AFTER THIS SHIP PERFORMS A GREEN MANEUVER: This ship may perform a [target-lock] Action as a Free Action

captains.name: K'Mpec
captains.text: ACTION: Spend one Shield Token from this ship. Place 3 [evade] Tokens beside this ship.

captains.name: Movar
captains.text: During the Gather Forces step, you may switch one of your [crew], [tech], or [weapon] Upgrade slots on your ship for a [crew], [tech], [weapon], or [talent] Upgrade slot.

captains.name: Gowron
captains.text: If this card is assigned to a Klingon ship and all your shields have been destroyed, you gain +1 attack die on all of your attacks. If any of your Shield Tokens are repaired, you lose this bonus attack die.

captains.name: Liviana Charvanek
captains.text: ACTION: If your ship has the [cloak] Action on its Action Bar, place a [cloak] Token beside your ship then immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

captains.name: Kurn
captains.text:
During the Combat Phase, each time you defend, you may re-roll 1 of your [battlestations] results. If this card is assigned to a Klingon ship, you may re-roll up to 2 of your [battlestations] results.

Kurn may field 1 Klingon [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Gowron
captains.text: ACTION: If there is not already a [battlestations] Token beside your ship, place 1 [battlestations] Token beside your ship. In addition, if your ship is a Klingon ship with a Klingon Captain assigned to it, you may immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

captains.name: Kolo
captains.text: DECLARE TARGET STEP: If this ship is within range and the firing arc of an opposing attacking ship, target a friendly defending ship within range 1. This ship becomes the target of the attack instead of the friendly defending ship. Treat this ship as though it’s at the same range as the target friendly defending ship for this attack.

captains.name: Orfil Quinteros
captains.text: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. Repair 1 damage to your Hull for every [evade] result. Place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship for each point of damage you repair with this action.

captains.name: Surat
captains.text: ACTION: Place a [scan] Token beside your ship. If you do not have a [tech] Upgrade deployed to your ship, place the Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship as well

captains.name: Nu'Daq
captains.text: When attacking, you may convert 1 [battlestations] result into a [hit] result.

captains.name: Gul Ranor
captains.text: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 [forward] or 2 [forward] Maneuver. Place an Auxiliary Power Token next to your ship.

captains.name: Daimon Goss
captains.text: SETUP: Place 3 Gold-Pressed Latinum Tokens on this card. ---------------------------------------- PLANNING PHASE: Target an Obstacle, spend 3 GPLT and place 2 [time] Tokens on this card. Continuous Effect: While this ship is within Range of the target Obstacle, this ship rolls +3 defense dice.

captains.name: Daimon Tog
captains.text: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 of your non-disabled [crew] Upgrades and then disable 1 [crew] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

captains.name: Gorkon
captains.text: ACTION: Disable Gorkon to perform this Action. Your ship and every ship that attacks you this round rolls 2 less attack dice.

captains.name: Valdore
captains.text: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

captains.name: Worf
captains.text: When attacking, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

captains.name: Somraw Cmdr
captains.text: Each time you attack at Range 3, if you do not have an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, you may add +1 attack die. If you add the attack die, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Gelnon
captains.text: ACTION: Target an enemy ship in your forward firing arc within Range 1 and immediately roll 2 attack dice. The target ship does not roll any defense dice against this attack and sustains damage as normal for each [hit] or [crit]. If you roll at least 1 [battlestations] result, place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Kira Nerys
captains.text: ACTION: All other friendly ships within Range 1-2 of your ship may immediately perform a [target-lock] Action as a free Action, if possible.

captains.name: Tahna Los
captains.text: Add 1 additional [tech] icon to your ship's Upgrade Bar. One of the [tech] upgrades you purchase for Tahna Los's ship costs exactly 3 Squadron Points and is placed face down beside his card; this Upgrade cannot refer to a specific ship or class of ship. This Upgrade remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

captains.name: Chakotay
captains.text: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable Chakotay to allow two different crew Upgrades to perform their Actions during the same Round.

captains.name: Vanik
captains.text: All of your Vulcan and Federation [tech] Upgrades cost -2 SP.

captains.name: Jonathan Archer
captains.text: Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [crew] Upgrades. For each [crew] Upgrade you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die when attacking with your Primary Weapon AND increase your Skill Number by +1 until the End Phase.

captains.name: V'Las
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [crew] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

captains.name: Salatrel
captains.text: At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. For the rest of the game, during each Combat Phase, if a ship of that Faction is in your forward firing arc, treat your Captain Skill Number as if it were a 10 until the End Phase of that round.

captains.name: Calvin Hudson
captains.text: Add 1 [tech], [weapon] or [crew] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 5 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 of your Drone Tokens to force your opponent to roll 1 less defense die.

captains.name: Miles O'Brien
captains.text: Add 1 [tech] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Repair 1 Damage to your Hull or Shields.

captains.name: Viceroy
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 2 Mission Tokens on this card. During the Planning Phase, after all other ships have chosen their Maneuvers, you may discard 1 of the Mission Tokens from this card to target a ship at Range 1, look at that ship's Maneuver dial, and then select your Maneuver. The target ship cannot change its chosen Maneuver after you look at it.

captains.name: Gul Macet
captains.text: When attacking, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may add +1 attack die to your roll. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Jabin
captains.text: When defending, your ship rolls +1 defense dice.

captains.name: Taris
captains.text: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Declare Target step, you may discard one of your [crew] Upgrades to target a ship that is not in your forward firing arc.

captains.name: S'Sesslak
captains.text: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [battlestations] result OR 1 [battlestations] result into 1 [hit] result.

captains.name: Rekar
captains.text: When attacking with a Secondary Weapon, you may add +1 attack die to the attack. If you do so, discard that [weapon] Upgrade after the attack is completed.

captains.name: Gul Jasad
captains.text: ACTION: When attacking this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may add +1 attack die for each friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship (max +2). If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Kiaphet Amman'sor
captains.text: When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. If your ship's Hull value is greater than the attacking ship's Hull value, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

captains.name: Tuvok
captains.text: Add 1 [tech] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. That Upgrade costs -1 SP.

captains.name: Beverly Crusher
captains.text: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, each time you defend this round, you may convert 1 of your [battlestations] results into an [evade] result.

captains.name: Hayes
captains.text: ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).

captains.name: K'Temoc
captains.text:
All of your Klingon Upgrades cost -1 SP. The faction penalty is doubled for any non-Klingon Upgrades assigned to your ship.

K'Temoc may only field Klingon [talent] Upgrades.

captains.name: Velal
captains.text: ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

captains.name: Hikaru Sulu
captains.text: Action: Perfrom a 1 [bank-left] or 1 [bank-right] Maneuver and place 1 [evade] Token beside this ship.

captains.name: Telev
captains.text: This card counts as an Andorian Captain. ---------------------------------------- WHEN THIS SHIP SPENDS AN [evade] OR [battlestations] TOKEN: Target a friendly ship. Place a token of the same type beside the target ship.

captains.name: T'Pol
captains.text: COMBAT PHASE: Choose [evade] or [battlestations] Tokens You may spend [scan] Tokens as though they were the chosen type of upgrade this Combat Phase.

captains.name: Operations Drone
captains.text: Setup: Place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. ---------------------------------------- PLANNING PHASE: Spend 1 Drone Token on this card and target an opposing ship. Place an [aux] Token beside the target ship.

captains.name: 'First'
captains.text: Setup: Place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. ---------------------------------------- ACTIVATION PHASE: Spend 1 Drone Token Remove 2 [time] Tokens or 1 Disabled Token from an UPGRADE equipped to this ship.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text: Setup: Place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. ---------------------------------------- COMBAT PHASE: If an opposing ship is within range, spend 1 Drone Token. Place a [battlestations] Token beside this ship.

captains.name: Thomas Riker
captains.text: You do not pay a faction penalty when equipping this card to a Federation ship. ---------------------------------------- END PHASE: This ship may perform a maneuver on its dial with a speed of 2 or less.

captains.name: Prak
captains.text: SETUP:Place 2 Gold-Pressed Latinum Tokens on this card. ---------------------------------------- ACTIVATION PHASE: Spend 1 GPLT and target an opposing ship. The controller of the target ship chooses 1 of the following *Repair 1 damage to this ships Hull or Shields. *The target ship cannot perform Actions this game round.

captains.name: Duras
captains.text:
Romulan [talent] and Klingon [talent] Upgrades equipped to this Captain cost 3 SP.
----------------------------------------
[talent] Upgrades equipped to this Captain start the game face down. Flip a face down [talent] Upgrade equipped to this Captain face up the first time it is used.

captains.name: William T. Riker
captains.text: ACTION: Target this ship or a friendly ship. [crew] Upgrades equipped to the target ship cannot be affected by opposing effects this game round.

captains.name: Yelgrun
captains.text: ACTION: Target an opposing ship whose Captain has a higher Captain Skill than the Captain of this ship. This game round, the Captain Skill of the Captain on the target ship is decreased by 1 and that Captain cannot use its ability.

captains.name: Alidar Jarok
captains.text: ACTIVATION PHASE: After an opposing ship moves but before its Perform Action Step, target that ship and place 2 [time] Tokens on this card. Choose an Action on the target ships Action Bar other then [regenerate]. This target ship must perfrom the chosen Action during its Perform Action Step.

captains.name: Deyos
captains.text: ACTION: Target a friendly ship. Equip a [crew] Upgrade that was discarded from the target ship to the target ship. The target ship cannot attack this game round.

captains.name: Kurn
captains.text: ACTION: If your ship is within Range 1 of an Obstacle roll 2 attack dice. Every ship within Range 1 of the Obstacle suffers damage as normal for each [hit] or [crit] result. Ships do not roll defense dice against this.

captains.name: Duras, Son of Toral
captains.text: ACTIVATION PHASE: After an enemy ship in Range moves. You may change this ship's Maneuver.

captains.name: Edward Jellico
captains.text: At any time you may disable 1 of your [tech] or [weapon] Upgrades to place 1 [evade], [scan], or [battlestations] Token beside your ship. You may only use this ability once per round.

captains.name: Borg Queen
captains.text: At the start of the game place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1 and spend 2 of your Drone Tokens. Disable 1 [crew] Upgrade on the target ship (your choice) and steal it even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

captains.name: Thy'Lek Shran
captains.text: Whenever you perform an [evade] or [scan] Action, you may target a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship. If you do so place a Token of the same type beside the target ship and an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: William T. Riker
captains.text: ACTION: If you are attacked this round at Range 1, Roll 2 attack dice. Any [hit] or [crit] result damages the attacking ship as normal, even if your ship is destroyed by their attack. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice.

captains.name: Khan Singh
captains.text: (Gen-Con Promo) You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Khan or any [talent] Upgrade to your ship. If any Captain in play has a higher Skill Number than Khan, Khan's Skill Number equals that Captain's Skill Number.

captains.name: Christopher Pike
captains.text: All of your [crew] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

captains.name: Donatra

captains.name: Gowron

captains.name: Thot Gor
captains.text: All of your [weapon] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

captains.name: Letant
captains.text: Each round, when defending, you may force one opponent to re-roll one of their [crit] results.

captains.name: Benjamin Sisko
captains.text: Once per round, you may re-roll any one of your attack or defense dice.

captains.name: Chang
captains.text: ACTION: Spend your target lock to perform this Action. Disable the Captain Card on the ship that was target locked.

captains.name: Weyoun
captains.text: Disable Weyoun to prevent 1 of your [crew] Upgrades from being disabled or discarded this round.

captains.name: Hikaru Sulu
captains.text: ACTION: Disable one of your [crew] Upgrades to remove an opponent's [target-lock] Token from your ship. Remove the corresponding token from the opponent's ship as well.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text:
At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. 

After you spend a [target-lock] Token to re-roll your dice, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to maintain your Target Lock on the target ship (i.e., do not remove the [target-lock] Tokens from beside either ship).

captains.name: Liviana Charvanek
captains.text: Whenever one of your [crew] Upgrades is supposed to be disabled, roll 1 defense die. If you roll a [battlestations] result, that Upgrade is not disabled. If you are disabling the [crew] Upgrade to perform its Action or ability, that Action or ability is still performed even if the Upgrade does not disable.

captains.name: Michael Eddington
captains.text: At the start of the game, place 3 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship a Range 1-3 and discard 1 Mission Token from this card. Target ship rolls -2 attack dice against your ship for each of its attacks this round.

captains.name: Gul Damar
captains.text:
All attacks made against your ship with Secondary Weapons are at -1 attack die. 

All attacks made against your ship with Minefields are at -2 attack dice.

captains.name: Mr. Spock
captains.text: Your ship may perform a [target-lock] or [scan] Action as a free Action each round.

captains.text: Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Choose 1 of your [crew] Upgrades that was discarded from your ship on a previous round. Re-deploy that [crew] Upgrade to your ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Jean-Luc Picard
captains.text: Add 1 [crew] slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable all of your remaining Shields and immediately perform an additional green or white maneuver.

captains.name: Solok
captains.text: You may perform an [evade] or a [scan] Action as a free Action each round.  If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Chakotay
captains.text: Add 1 [weapon] or [crew] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar (your choice). ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Korok
captains.text: When you initiate an attack against a ship at Range 1, at the start of the Deal Damage step of the Combat Phase, disable 1 Active Shield on the target ship (if possible).

captains.name: Korok

At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. 

When you inflict damage to an opponent's Hull, during the Deal Damage step, you may spend 1 Drone Token to convert 1 Normal Damage into 1 Critical Damage.

captains.name: Tactical Drone
captains.text:
At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card.

admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a [crew] Upgrade equipped to this ship. Move all [time] TOkens from this target [crew] Upgrade to this card if that [crew] Upgrade has an Action you may perform that Action as a Free Action.

admirals.name: Christopher Pike

admirals.text: You may only equip the 'Grand Nagus' and 'Rules of Acquisition' [talent] Upgrades to this Admiral. ---------------------------------------- SETUP: Place 2 GPLT on this card. ---------------------------------------- WHEN YOU WOULD SPEND ONE OR MORE GPLT: You may roll a number of defense dice equal to the number of GPLT that would be spent. For each [evade], spend 1 fewer GPLT.

admirals.name: Female Changeling
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Decrease the Captain Skill of this Captain by 1 this game round. Perfrom an Action on this ships Action Bar and an Action on a Dominion [crew] equipped to this ship as Free Actions.

admirals.name: Sela

admirals.name: Kiaphet Amman'Sor
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: When defending this round roll +1 defense die. In addition if this card is assigned to a Xindi ship when attacking this round gain +1 attack die.

admirals.name: Liviana Charvanek
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: If your ship has the [cloak] Action on its Action Bar place a [cloak] Token beside your ship then immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

admirals.name: Gowron
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: If there is not already a [battlestations] Token beside your ship, place 1 [battlestations] Token beside your ship. In addition, if your ship is a Klingon ship with a Klingon Captain assigned to it, you may immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

admirals.name: James T. Kirk
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable one Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

admirals.name: V'Las

admirals.name: Matthew Dougherty
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.

admirals.name: Gorkon

admirals.name: Hiren

admirals.name: Mendak
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 (including your own) that has no [battlestations] Token(s) beside it and place a [battlestations] Token beside that ship. The target ship cannot perform a [battlestations] Action this round. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan ship.

admirals.name: Gul Madred
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 6 or less, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 7 or higher, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [battlestations] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.

admirals.name: Black
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Perform a [sensor-echo] Action with a 1 [forward] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [sensor-echo] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

admirals.name: Gardner
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.

admirals.name: Erik Pressman
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your [tech] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your [tech] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.

admirals.name: Jaro Essa
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [crew] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.

admirals.name: Martok

admirals.name: William Ross

admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([evade], [scan], [battlestations], or [target-lock]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [target-lock] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [target-lock] Token.

admirals.name: Velal
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [evade] result to your roll.
